system.description: A wall of thorns spell creates a barrier of very tough, pliable, tangled brush bearing needle-sharp thorns. The wall is 1 foot thick per caster level and can be shaped to any configuration. Anyone moving through the wall at half speed takes 1 point of piercing damage per caster level (max 15). Moving at less than half speed deals 1d6 points of damage per caster level (max 15d6). The wall can be burned; it has 3 hit points per inch of thickness per caster level (max 15). Fire can spread along the wall. The wall does not harm plant creatures. A wall of thorns can be made permanent with permanency.
system.target: Wall of thorny brush, up to one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
